name: GlobalContextQueryService

methods.name: checkAndRemoveDateContextParams
methods.rawdescription:
Checks for any date context query parameters and removes them if present.
This method detects exactly which parameters are present and only removes those.
methods.description: Checks for any date context query parameters and removes them if present. This method detects exactly which parameters are present and only removes those.

methods.name: dateTimeContextFromQueryParams
methods.rawdescription:
Creates global context state from query parameters.
Interval data takes precedence over date time context described by date "from" and date "to",
so if valid interval is provided, date "from" and date "to" are ignored, and they are recalculated
with interval.
methods.description: Creates global context state from query parameters. Interval data takes precedence over date time context described by date "from" and date "to", so if valid interval is provided, date "from" and date "to" are ignored, and they are recalculated with interval.

jsdoctags.comment: GlobalContextState based on current query params or null if query params provide no valid context.

methods.name: queryParamsChange$
methods.rawdescription:
Returns observable that emits date context query params every time query params change.
Invalid values are filtered out.
methods.description: Returns observable that emits date context query params every time query params change. Invalid values are filtered out.

methods.name: setDateContextQueryParams
methods.rawdescription:
Sets query parameters related to date time context.
Valid interval (and other than 'custom') takes precedence over context described by date "from" and date "to".
Interval and context described by date "from" and date "to" exclude each other.
methods.description: Sets query parameters related to date time context. Valid interval (and other than 'custom') takes precedence over context described by date "from" and date "to". Interval and context described by date "from" and date "to" exclude each other.

description: Service for handling date context query parameters in the URL
rawdescription: Service for handling date context query parameters in the URL
